BLHar2316.First Lines: Ȝis is ȝi sete domes manȝif riht dom ȝif ȝow kan…
BLHar2316.Last Lines: …Lawe and liht is ȝi faderis felloke on ȝat and deme wel
BLHar2316.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.120.
Kittredge,  George Lyman. 
             “Earth upon Earth.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         9 (1894): 135-6: 271.
